function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Engaging residents in the design and decision-making process, incorporating their needs and preferences","category":"Community-driven development projects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting comprehensive research on societal trends, health challenges, and technological advancements to inform design decisions","category":"Urban planning for health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving healthcare facilities and infrastructure in urban areas, implementing public health awareness programs","category":"Public health campaigns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic diversification, investment in healthcare infrastructure and services","category":"Healthcare access and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing modern housing standards, upgrading existing housing infrastructure","category":"Housing infrastructure upgrades","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in social safety nets and equitable economic policies","category":"Equitable economic policies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community land trusts, regulations to protect public spaces, and community-driven development projects","category":"Community-driven development projects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental protection regulations, sustainable urban planning, and community engagement in environmental preservation","category":"Sustainable urban planning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reintroduction of urban and architectural concepts, focus on public health","category":"Public health in architecture","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coordinated planning, regulatory frameworks","category":"Regulatory frameworks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Green space integration, improved ventilation systems","category":"Green space integration and ventilation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in social infrastructure, public health campaigns, and community support systems","category":"Community support systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improvement in housing design, implementation of ventilation systems, and efficient use of space","category":"Housing design and ventilation systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of outdoor public spaces, implementation of safe outdoor gathering areas, and community planning for open spaces","category":"Outdoor public spaces promotion","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular inspections and maintenance, addressing infrastructure issues, and promoting cleanliness and hygiene practices","category":"Infrastructure maintenance and cleanliness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment and retrofitting of buildings, infrastructure upgrades, and compliance with current building codes","category":"Building retrofitting and compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in and improvement of social infrastructure and facilities, as well as promoting healthcare access","category":"Social infrastructure improvement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation and maintenance of green spaces, promotion of urban gardening and green infrastructure","category":"Green space creation and promotion","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Designing communal spaces, promoting community engagement, and fostering social activities within residential areas","category":"Community engagement and social activities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing stricter hygiene and sanitation measures, as well as introducing guidelines for ventilation and air circulation within buildings.","category":"Hygiene and sanitation measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection protocols for communal areas, as well as promoting education and awareness among residents regarding safe usage and maintenance practices.","category":"Cleaning and disinfection protocols","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use online survey tools and virtual data collection methods to minimize in-person interactions","category":"Virtual data collection methods","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopt strict safety measures during data collection, provide personal protective equipment to data collectors and respondents","category":"Safety measures for data collection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict safety protocols for site visits and inspections, use virtual tools for evaluation where possible","category":"Safety protocols for site visits","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further analysis to determine the specific health risks and needs of urban and suburban residents.","category":"Health risk analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyze age-related trends to tailor disease prevention efforts to different age groups.","category":"Age-related disease prevention","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of resilient mechanisms and design guidelines into existing and future residential buildings","category":"Resilient building integration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of guidelines for improvement and increased resilience in residential spaces","category":"Resilience guidelines implementation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and ventilation systems in home workspaces","category":"Home workspace hygiene and ventilation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide guidance on ergonomic setup and create dedicated workspaces within living areas","category":"Ergonomic workspace setup","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement travel restrictions and quarantine protocols for individuals using vacation properties for work/study","category":"Travel restrictions and quarantine protocols","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide accessible outdoor spaces within apartment complexes, promote balcony gardening","category":"Accessible outdoor spaces","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enforce strict self-isolation guidelines, limit the number of people in common areas","category":"Self-isolation enforcement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Educating respondents about safe outdoor practices and promoting the use of protective measures like masks and hand hygiene","category":"Education on outdoor safety","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encouraging travel behavior that minimizes contact with others and promoting testing and quarantine measures","category":"Promotion of safe travel behavior","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Providing information on the healthcare infrastructure and disease prevalence in the chosen location, promoting vaccination and health services","category":"Healthcare information promotion","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Education on infection control measures, standardized building design guidelines","category":"Infection control education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promotion of high-quality ventilation and sanitation in apartment buildings, urban planning for green spaces","category":"Ventilation and sanitation promotion","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public health campaigns on infection control, mental health support for apartment dwellers","category":"Public health campaigns","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Facilitating the creation of dedicated home office spaces, providing ergonomic furniture, and implementing noise reduction measures","category":"Home office facilitation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Providing access to outdoor spaces, creating rooftop gardens, and incorporating balconies or terraces in residential buildings","category":"Outdoor space access and design","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing clear guidelines for self-isolation, providing separate isolation facilities, and enhancing ventilation systems","category":"Self-isolation guidelines implementation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Engage in policy development for effective housing strategies, prioritize public health in housing policies","category":"Housing policy development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improve lighting and ventilation in residential buildings, prioritize natural ventilation in common areas","category":"Lighting and ventilation improvement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote outdoor and social activities within safe guidelines, provide mental health support
